title: Great opportunities
description: Great company. The pay is competitive. The discount is nice also. I wish they would go back to 24 hours. People are utilizing the self check out more.

title: Okay workplace
description: It was okay to work here. Management pretty much only care about themselves. They claim to train you, but they just handed me a Zebra and told me to scan things.

title: Would like too work there again.very good experience
description: What is the best part of working at the company?

title: Overwhelming work load
description: A lot of responsibility especially if you‚Äôre the only decorator . You will do the job of 2 people.  If you‚Äôre lucky, your team lead will have your back. Otherwise, they do intimidate you with unrealistic production goals till you quit.

title: Fast Paced, Great Co workers
description: You‚Äôre always on your feet. It‚Äôs fast-paced, but there are also slower days to balance it out. The job requires attention to detail and strong customer service skills. It can be stressful, but the coworkers are nice.

title: Easy
description: Easy job within walmart, alot of time to yourself which is good if you can manager yourself, would recommend as a starting point for retail workers to work and learn

title: Get what you put in
description: Management depends on the person, workplace culture is okay, hardest part of the job was getting associated to do their jobs, most enjoyable part was relationships built

title: Stressful environment, decent pay.
description: Picking orders was repetitive and customers always seem inconvenienced by your presence. The pay is good for not needing any experience. I would be a good job if you don't mind the negative customer attitude. Time off benefits are good.

title: good job
description: Solid Job, The management can be iffy but that anywhere. You get hired for a positons and that what you do for a good pay. Willing to work with you if youre a student or something comes up. Great perks.

title: Good Work Environment
description: There really wasn't anything difficult about the job itself aside from dealing rude customers. The management is fabulous and the team is like a big family.

title: Easy and independent
description: Nice job if u can lift and bend down and just work by urself doing organization and taking out orders it‚Äôs simple for the average person whos worked a job before

title: Stressful and Draining
description: only reason i didnt give it a 1 star is because of the pay and benefits, but the environment is completely soul sucking. if you want a job theat wont make you depressed, this is NOT it.

title: Review
description: Most Enjoyable part of the job is being able to work as a team

title: Decent up/down work place
description: I worked here full time. I was mainly a stocker but occasionally had to do team lead work which I wasn‚Äôt compensated for. Others half-done work was put onto me, and bc of that, I was held at high expectations. I would get threatened if I couldn‚Äôt keep

title: Awesome üëç
description: What is the best part of working at the company?

title: Great pay
description: Always busy. Always moving products around to encourage customers to look for and discover new items to purchase.

title: too much for too little.
description: What is the best part of working at the company?

title: terrible
description: Hardest part of the job is the co-workers and management, very unorganized. A typical day at work looks like Black Friday. I wasn't properly trained at all. Mostly what I knew was self-taught or just picked up & learned while working. Honestly the worst job I ever had hands down

title: Great Place
description: Good management, love the ease of scheduling on apps. Point system can be difficult but if you have a good coach then not too bad! Love that company offers paid maternity leave!

title: Easy and simple work
description: Its not bad at all the main thing that will challenge you is getting your orders done on time but you get a whole hour to do so and the depending on how your managers are is how it is to work there.

title: Just Awful place to work.
description: What is the best part of working at the company?
